name: MACK TRUCKS, INC., Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, BOARD OF FINANCE AND REVENUE

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.

Mr. Justice MONTEMURO is sitting by designation as Senior Justice pursuant to Judicial Assignment Docket No. 94 R1800, due to the unavailability of Mr. Justice LARSEN, see No. 127 Judicial Administration Docket No. 1, filed October 28, 1993.
parties: MACK TRUCKS, INC., Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, BOARD OF FINANCE AND REVENUE.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
Mr. Justice MONTEMURO is sitting by designation as Senior Justice pursuant to Judicial Assignment Docket No. 94 R1800, due to the unavailability of Mr. Justice LARSEN, see No. 127 Judicial Administration Docket No. 1, filed October 28, 1993.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Robert L. Weldon, Harrisburg, for Mack Trucks Inc.
Bart J. DeLuea, Jr., Harrisburg, for Board of Finance and Revenue.
casebody.head_matter:
640 A.2d 411
MACK TRUCKS, INC., Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, BOARD OF FINANCE AND REVENUE.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 7, 1994.
Decided April 22, 1994.
Robert L. Weldon, Harrisburg, for Mack Trucks Inc.
Bart J. DeLuea, Jr., Harrisburg, for Board of Finance and Revenue.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
